title: Stock Futures Gain After Selloff Sends Indexes to 2022 Lows
sub_head: The yield on benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasurys was edging lower
body:
U.S. stock futures rebounded Tuesday, putting major indexes on course to halt three days of punishing declines.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 rose 0.9%, a day after the broad index slumped 3.2% to its lowest level for the year. Technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures rose 1.4% while contracts tied to the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.7%.
